doc:
James Gordon (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Gordon_(actor) 0 James Gordon (April 23, 1871 – May 12, 1941) was an American silent film actor. He appeared in 127 films between 1911 and 1935. He also directed 4 films between 1913 and 1915, including the 1915 film The New Adventures of J. Rufus Wallingford. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and died in Hollywood, California from post-surgical complications. James_Gordon ( April_23_,_1871 – May_12_,_1941 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor . He appeared in 127_films between 1911_and_1935 . He also directed 4_films between 1913_and_1915 , including the_1915_film The_New_Adventures of J._Rufus_Wallingford . He was_born in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania , and died in Hollywood , California from post-surgical_complications .
